resources.string: We have diferent kinds of land transports ready to cater for different journeys and functions. Our prices are just fair. hoping to see you using of our means of transport so that you can join a group of happy custormers. Feel free to contact us if you need more information
We had a good time using your services
Can\'t wait to use your services again
We are near Chilinde parish, Area 23, Kawale Malawi. For precise location click on map button on at the home screen

When you are looking for a dedicated and trustworthy freight forwarding company, why not turn to us? With many years of experience in the industry, we are a proven leader and have a deep commitment to our customers.

We are a full-service transportation and logistics provider offering airfreight, truckload, ocean freight, railway transportation, LTL, expedited, intermodal, project management, and specialized services. As one of the top freight forwarding companies, we have the expertise that allows us to prepare and process the documentation and perform related activities pertaining to international shipments. With transportation solutions including Air and Sea, Distribution (including Truckload and Less Than Truckload), 3PL Services, Warehouse Management and Intermodal, we can create a unique supply chain logistics solution that will allow you to focus on what matters most â€“ your core goals.

Through ongoing education of our agents -- both customer service and cartage -- as well as through our partners, We ensure global governmental compliance. Key professional and regulatory memberships include the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). In addition, we are a TAPA and C-TPAT member and have key market Certified Cargo Screening Facilities.

For You to get strated with our app you have to launch/open it and choose your prefered languege. After that you have to click continue to get to the home screen (Figure 1.0 below shows the choose languge screen)

Then you will be taken to the home page where you have a lot option option to select from. if you want to know more aabout the service you can just TAP on it and you will be directed to the product details page. There is a button for location whre you are presented with google map to help find our bussiness location easier. there is call button incase you want to have some talks with us. There is also an emal button if you want to write us an email. last is the whatsapp button for a chat on whatsApp

On same main page you are also presented with direfent icons to perfom different actions. There is a search icon that gives you a chance to serch for diferent services present is the app. There is also a sign in icon that lets ypu signin to your account. once on the sign in page you can sign in to your account or follow the gicen links to create an account if ypu dont have or reset your password if forgotten
A transportation company is a business that transports freight from one location to another which is a key in the value chain in manufacturing.

The entire process of transporting products from the producer to the consumer which includes storage, transportation, warehousing, handling, packaging, and the exchange of information is called logistics.
Even though less than one percent of world transport is done by airline it accounts for forty percent of the value and becomes a valuable step in the logistics process.
We have nice coaches to Travel both in and outside Malawi
